languages.text: Ксеномеханизм, пожиравший страдания жертв Хтоноса и преобразовавший их в энергию.
The Chtonos's xenomechanism that devoured its victims' suffering and converted it into energy.
languages.original_text: Ксеномеханизм, пожиравший страдания жертв Хтоноса и преобразовавший их в энергию.

traits.locale_text: Chtonos's xenomechanism that devoured its victims' suffering and converted it to energy.

languages.text: 犠牲者の苦しみを貪り、エネルギーに変換するクロノスの異種族メカニズム。
languages.original_text: The Chtonos's xenomechanism that devoured its victims' suffering and converted it into energy.

traits.locale_text: 犠牲者の苦しみを貪り、エネルギーに変換するクロノスの異種族メカニズム。

languages.text: 奇托诺斯的异形装置可以吞噬受害者的痛苦，将其转化为能量。
languages.original_text: The Chtonos's xenomechanism that devoured its victims' suffering and converted it into energy.

traits.locale_text: 奇托诺斯的异形装置可以吞噬受害者的痛苦，将其转化为能量。

languages.text: El xenomecanismo de Chtonos que devoraba el sufrimiento de sus víctimas y lo convertía en energía.
languages.original_text: The Chtonos's xenomechanism that devoured its victims' suffering and converted it into energy.

traits.locale_text: El xenomecanismo de Chtonos que devoraba el sufrimiento de sus víctimas y lo convertía en energía.

languages.text: Der Xeno-Mechanismus des Chtonos, der das Leid seiner Opfer verschlungen und in Energie umgewandelt hat.
languages.original_text: The Chtonos's xenomechanism that devoured its victims' suffering and converted it into energy.

traits.locale_text: Der Xeno-Mechanismus des Chtonos, der das Leid seiner Opfer verschlungen und in Energie umgewandelt hat.

languages.text: Le xénomécanisme chtonos qui a converti la souffrance de ses victimes en énergie.
languages.original_text: The Chtonos's xenomechanism that devoured its victims' suffering and converted it into energy.

traits.locale_text: Le xénomécanisme chtonos qui a converti la souffrance de ses victimes en énergie.

languages.text: Ktonos'un, kurbanlarının acılarını emen ve onları enerjiye dönüştüren zenomekanizması.
languages.original_text: The Chtonos's xenomechanism that devoured its victims' suffering and converted it into energy.

traits.locale_text: Ktonos'un, kurbanlarının acılarını emen ve onları enerjiye dönüştüren zenomekanizması.
